segments.text: Wow . That girl who brings the fruit is really pretty ! I wish she wouldn't have rushed off so fast ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , it's an English song ! Sing with us , Ryan !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: " Tie a Yellow Ribbon on the Old Oak Tree " ? ! Where did you learn that song ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everyone in Taiwan knows it . Come on ! Sing with us !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but I can't ! That's something my grandmother would sing !
segments.speaker: S1
